EncryptaGuard Services
Tell Me More

Services

Enterprise-grade network protection made simple for your business.

Liability Shield

Don't let a customer's illegal download shut down your internet. We isolate your Guest Wi-Fi from your Credit Card terminals, protecting your business from liability and hackers.

Staff Focus & Speed

Stop paying for TikTok scrolling. Our 'Business Lane' Wi-Fi blocks social media and streaming on staff devices, ensuring your bandwidth—and your payroll—is used for work.

Managed Resilience

You focus on your business; we focus on the hardware. We provide 24/7 remote monitoring and automated threat updates, ensuring your node is always hardened against the latest global vulnerabilities without you lifting a finger.

How It Works

Securing your business takes 5 minutes.

  • Step 1

    We Ship The Node

    You receive the pre-configured EncryptaGuard Node. No complex manuals or IT degree required.

  • Step 2

    Plug It In

    Connect the Node to your existing router using the included cable. It automatically creates your new Secure Wi-Fi network.

  • Step 3

    You Are Secure

    Connect your devices to the new network. Ads disappear. Threats are blocked. You can now work safely.

  • Get
    Started
    Today

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about your new secure network.

It is a managed security device that sits between your internet modem and your Wi-Fi router. It acts as a "filter" that cleans your internet traffic of ads, trackers, and malware before they reach your devices.

While a firewall blocks unauthorized "doors" into your network, EncryptaGuard provides Content Intelligence. We stop your devices from connecting to known malicious websites and distraction-heavy services (like TikTok) that standard firewalls ignore. It is the essential second layer of modern business security.

Standard ISP routers often send your browsing data unencrypted. EncryptaGuard uses Enterprise-Grade Encryption (DNS-over-HTTPS) to wrap your traffic in a secure tunnel, making it invisible to hackers and even your own ISP.

Actually, most users find their internet feels faster. Because we block thousands of "invisible" ad requests at the network level, your computers don't have to waste time downloading junk data.

A personal VPN protects the user, but it doesn't protect your business. EncryptaGuard ensures that your bandwidth isn't being wasted on non-work traffic (like social media) that slows down your critical business systems.

No. While our engine is world-class, EncryptaGuard is a Managed Fleet Solution. We utilize a Master-Replica architecture to push global threat updates to your business in under 60 seconds. You aren't just getting an app; you’re getting managed infrastructure.

Not for you. We use Zero-Touch Provisioning. We ship you a pre-configured node; you plug it in, and our automated systems handle the rest—including all security patches and performance updates.

Our nodes are monitored 24/7. If your network goes offline, we are alerted immediately. Your settings are saved securely on the device and will automatically resume protection the moment power is restored.
